metadata.title: CVE-2021-29338 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Integer Overflow in OpenJPEG v2.4.0 allows remote attackers to crash theapplication, causing a Denial of Service (DoS). This occurs when theattacker uses the command line option "-ImgDir" on a directory thatcontains 1048576 files.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
blender package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
texmaker package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
